name: Ray Tracing (All GPU's) Survival Prototype
description:
Description:

A real-time fully ray-traced benchmark prototype of an upcoming first-person survival game in very early development.

Controls:

WASD - Move forward, left, backward, right
Left Shift - Sprint
Escape - Exit

Requirements: 

OpenGL 3.3 GPU 
Windows 7 x64

Upcoming updates:

- Raytracing upgrades:

Supersampling
Global illumination
Major performance improvements
Researching RTX acceleration

- Gameplay:

Day / night cycle
Procedural world generation
Combat: An engaging combat system
Survival gameplay elements: Inventory, Gathering, Crafting and Building
